# Latest Data Page

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
# Load necessary libraries
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(rmarkdown)

# Read the CSV file from the remote location
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MMel099/UsedCarPricer/main/data/newest_data.csv"
data <- as.data.frame(read_csv(url))

# Rename the columns
names(data) <- c("Year", "Mileage", "Listed Price", "Trim", "Vin", "Dealership", "City", "Date", "Estimated Price", "Discount")

# Reorder the columns
summary_data <- data[c("Date", "Year", "Mileage", "Trim", "Listed Price", "Estimated Price", "Discount")]
DT::datatable(data.summary, filter = 'top')
```
